title: Advisory Circle — New England Complex Systems Institute

seo.description:
By joining our Advisory Circle, you will receive a 30% discount on 
registration for all courses and conferences, along with a free copy of 
Making Things Work by NECSI President Yaneer Bar-Yam.

NECSI is a non-profit 501c(3) performing research to solve social problems, 
improve healthcare and prevent violence. Donations are tax exempt.

Your generous contributions enable NECSI to find solutions to the world’s 
most pressing challenges.
